description: Default SEO metadata for lawn care tenants

seo.description: Professional lawn care and landscaping services for residential and commercial properties. Reliable mowing, fertilization, seasonal cleanup, and landscape maintenance.

home.title: Professional Lawn Care Services | {businessName}
home.description: Expert lawn maintenance and landscaping services for beautiful, healthy lawns. Serving {serviceArea} with reliable, professional lawn care.

services.title: Our Services | {businessName}
services.description: Explore our comprehensive lawn care services including mowing, fertilization, aeration, seasonal cleanup, and landscape maintenance.

about.title: About Us | {businessName}
about.description: Learn about our professional lawn care team and our commitment to keeping your property looking its best year-round.

contact.title: Contact Us | {businessName}
contact.description: Get in touch to schedule your lawn care service or request a free quote. Serving {serviceArea} and surrounding areas.

quote.title: Request a Quote | {businessName}
quote.description: Get a free quote for professional lawn care services. Tell us about your property and we'll provide a detailed estimate.
